remarks: Value of the compact generator.  (The "k" in ` kGen ` comes from the name "k-space" for these spaces, after the German word kompakt.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.)
statement:
kgenval $p |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> ( kGen ` J ) = { x e. ~P X | A. k e. ~P X ( ( J |`t k ) e. Comp -> ( x i^i k ) e. ( J |`t k ) ) } ) $.
$d J k x $.
$d X k x $.
$d k x $.
